text: Hashim bin Aman (1 September 1929 â€“ 21 May 2018) was a Malaysian civil servant who served as the 7th Chief Secretary to the Government of Malaysia from 1982 to 1984. He retired in 1984, and a farewell ceremony was held at the Banquet Hall, Parliament House, Kuala Lumpur, on 14 July 1984, with Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad attending. After retiring, Hashim became the chairman of PERNAS. Hashim Aman passed away on 21 May 2018 at 89 while being treated at Kuala Lumpur Hospital. == References == Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Malaysian people Category:Civil servants
